title: The Comic Bang
overview: The story revolves around Luo Qiandai confessing her feelings to her crush, Ye Qi. Unexpectedly, Ye Qi gifts her a signed copy and tricks her into becoming his assistant for inking his comics. It turns out that the cold and aloof top student, Ye Qi, is actually a famous female manga artist! As Qiandai is mistaken for a fan, she enters Ye Qi's world of comics and gets to know a group of colorful and eccentric individuals. Each day is filled with unpredictable and exciting anti-cliché, high-energy, and anti-Mary Sue storylines. As the relationship between Qiandai and Ye Qi experiences ups and downs, everyone moves forward in pursuit of their dreams in the world of manga.
